page.title: 15BALMEDIE EVENTIDE HOME
page.content: In the eventide home there are 25 members of staff. 48 old people live there altogether. 11 of them are men and 37 are women. Most of the staff have worked there for about 20 years. In the house there are 11 single bedrooms and 15 double bedrooms. There is also an annexe which has more rooms. The old people each have a bathroom in their bedroom. A year ago 23 members of staff worked there, and there were only 45 old people living there. the eventide home was built in 1937. It was a private house before it was an old folks home. Round about the eventide home there is a beautiful wooded garden and a large lawn. The school has lots of visits to the garden. The eventide home is owned by the Church of Scotland.
